statements: SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, patient_name, report_date FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE severity_level > 2;
SELECT report_date, patient_name, compliance_status FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT product_name, adverse_event_description FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, severity_level FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE severity_level > 2 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, patient_name, report_date FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_date ASC
SELECT report_id, product_name, patient_name, report_date FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE severity_level = 3 AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant'
SELECT patient_name, severity_level, report_date FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY severity_level DESC, report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE product_name LIKE '%pain%' OR product_name LIKE '%injury%' AND (severity_level = 4 OR compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant') ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM AdverseEventReports;
SELECT report_id, event_description, event_date FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, event_description, event_date FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProductSafetyCompliance WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, approval_date FROM ProductSafetyCompliance ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, event_description FROM AdverseEventReports WHERE report_id > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductSafetyCompliance WHERE approval_date < '2020-06-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT report_id, event_description, event_date FROM AdverseEventReports INNER JOIN ProductSafetyCompliance ON AdverseEventReports.product_id = ProductSafetyCompliance.product_id WHERE ProductSafetyCompliance.manufacturer = 'XYZ Inc' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(event_date, approval_date)) AS avg_days_difference FROM AdverseEventReports JOIN ProductSafetyCompliance ON AdverseEventReports.product_id = ProductSafetyCompliance.product_id WHERE event_date IS NOT NULL AND approval_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM adverse_event_reports ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, dosage FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT report_id, event_description FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE event_date > '2021-01-01' AND event_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%pain%'
SELECT report_id, event_description FROM adverse_event_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, dosage FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, compliance_status, compliance_date FROM pharmaceutical_products p JOIN compliance_records c ON p.product_id = c.product_id WHERE compliance_status = 'Approved'
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT product_name, event_type FROM AdverseEvents WHERE severity='High';
SELECT reporter_name, organization FROM Reporters WHERE LENGTH(phone_number) > 10;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, dosage_strength, dosage_form FROM Products ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceStatus WHERE compliance_level='Non-compliant' AND last_checked BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT product_name, dosage_strength FROM Products WHERE dosage_form = 'Tablet' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT reporter_name, organization, contact_email FROM Reporters WHERE organization LIKE '%Health%' ORDER BY reporter_name DESC;
SELECT report_id, event_type, event_date, reporter_name, severity FROM AdverseEvents WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT a.product_name, a.event_type, r.reporter_name FROM AdverseEvents a JOIN Reporters r ON a.reporter_name = r.reporter_name WHERE a.severity = 'High' ORDER BY a.product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports;
SELECT event_id, event_description, reporter_name FROM adverse_event_reports;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, dosage_form FROM products;
SELECT * FROM reporters WHERE reporter_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, event_description, reported_date FROM adverse_event_reports ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_event_reports WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT event_description, reported_date FROM adverse_event_reports ORDER BY reported_date DESC
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, dosage_form FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Tablet' ORDER BY product_name
SELECT reporter_name, contact_email FROM reporters WHERE reporter_name LIKE '%John%'

SELECT a.event_id, a.event_description, p.product_name, r.reporter_name FROM adverse_event_reports a INNER JOIN products p ON a.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN reporters r ON a.reporter_name = r.reporter_name WHERE a.reported_date >= '2022-01-01'
